snippet.title: System Purge - Official Steam Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Available Now on Steam
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1515490/System_Purge/

Trapped in a buried, forgotten facility, you must reach the core of an ancient machine to rescue your lost lover. System Purge is a challenging, atmospheric, and action-packed 2D platformer.

Make it through 7 distinct sectors, from an abandoned weapons laboratory to a vast echo chamber

Survive a wide variety of increasingly deadly threats and obstacles

Discover secrets and complete hidden challenges to decipher the history of the Machine

-----------------------------------

Check out more of Actual Nerds on our website.
https://www.actualnerds.com/

Follow us on Twitter
https://twitter.com/ActualNerds
